I‚Äôm an SNSF Postdoctoral Fellow at the Scalable Parallel Computing Laboratory (SPCL), ETH Z√ºrich, advised by Prof. Torsten Hoefler. I obtained my PhD degree from Bilkent University under the supervision of Prof. Cevdet Aykanat. My research interests include Parallel Algorithms, High performance computing, efficient AI training, and graph/hypergraph partitioning.

Research Interests

I specialize in designing efficient parallel algorithms for machine learning and scientific computing applications that are difficult to parallelize.

  • Parallel & High-Performance Computing
  • Sparse Computations, Iterative Solvers
  • Sparse Tensor Decompositions
  • Graph/Hypergraph partitioning
  • Sparse matrix reordering methods
  • Machine Learning: Graph & Hypergraph Neural Networks, Parallel LLMs
